member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyFrameFile.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyFrameFile.Position
member.summary: 获取或设置文件的当前读写位置，即从数据起始的Frame数。

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyFrameFile.NumberOfFrames
member.summary: Total data size of file, in number of frames, valid only when openning existed file.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyFrameFile.Sampling
member.summary: 数据采样信息。

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyFrameFile.Frame
member.summary: 帧式数据信息。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyFrameFile.WriteFileHeader
member.summary: Write data information to file header, could be called after writing data. After the operation, file pointer will be set to the beginning of data (value of property "Position" is 0 after operation). In creating new file use case, it must be called once before writing first block data.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyFrameFile.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: 将文件的当前读写位置设置为给定值。
member.param: 相对于origin 的Frame数。
使用 System.IO.SeekOrigin 类型的值，将开始位置、结束位置或当前位置指定为 offset 的参考点。
member.returns: 文件读写的新位置，距离数据起始点的Frame数，即属性"Position"的值。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyFrameFile.Write(System.SByte[])
member.summary: 写入I8类型数据，若为多通道，则data中的数据为Channel Interleave(通道交织)存放。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyFrameFile.Write(System.Int16[])
member.summary: 写入I16类型数据，若为多通道，则data中的数据为Channel Interleave(通道交织)存放。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyFrameFile.Write(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: 以IntPtr写入数据，若为多通道，则data中的数据为Channel Interleave(通道交织)存放。
member.param: 数据长度，字节数。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyFrameFile.Read(System.SByte[])
member.summary: 读出I8类型数据，若为多通道，则data中的数据为Channel Interleave(通道交织)存放。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyFrameFile.Read(System.Int16[])
member.summary: 读出I16类型数据，若为多通道，则data中的数据为Channel Interleave(通道交织)存放。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyFrameFile.Read(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: 以IntPtr读出数据，若为多通道，则data中的数据为Channel Interleave(通道交织)存放。
member.param: 数据长度，字节数。

member.summary: 数据采样信息类型。

member.summary: 当数据采样信息类型为Independent时，每帧数据的帧头大小，字节数。

member.summary: 构造函数。

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFreqFrameFileSamplingInfoType
member.summary: 定频帧式Vector文件的采样信息类型。

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFreqFrameFileSamplingInfoType.Shared
member.summary: 所有数据帧有相同的采样信息。

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFreqFrameFileSamplingInfoType.Independent
member.summary: 每帧数据都有独立的采样信息：时间和地理位置。

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer
member.summary: Data priviewer for Vector File Fix Frequency Stream Format.

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer._scaleFactor
member.summary: Scale factor of channels, updated when Commit() is called.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.NumberOfSamples
member.summary: Total data size of file, in number of samples.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.SelectionStart
member.summary: Selected data start position, in Samples.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.SelectionEnd
member.summary: Selected data end position, in Samples.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.PreviewLength
member.summary: Result preview waveform length, in Samples.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.PreviewLengthAuto
member.summary: If set to true, preview waveform length is automatically selected.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.Unit
member.summary: Unit of preview data.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.Decimation
member.summary: Decimation ratio of preview data, calculated by "(SelectionEnd - SelectionStart + 1) /PreviewLength".

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.#ctor
member.summary: Create instance of data previewer for Vector File Fix Frequency Stream format.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.Commit
member.summary: Commit data selection to get output preview data(waveform) length.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.GetData(System.Double[]@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get one channel preview data.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.ProcessDataForPreview(System.Int16[],SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.DataPreviewResultOf1Ch1Segment[]@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Find the Max/Min pair of input "rawData" and return corresponding amplitude in "previewResult".
member.param: Channel interleaved data, and I/Q interleaved if data is complex format.
Returned preview data, its length must be the same as number of channels.
If true, input "rawData" is interleaved IQ format, if false, "rawData" is real format.

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.DataPreviewResultOf1Ch1Segment.MinValue
member.summary: Minimum value of the Segment

member.summary: Maximum value of the Segment

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.DataPreviewResultOf1Ch1Segment.IndexOfMin
member.summary: Index of minimum value.

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.FixFrequencyStreamDataPreviewer.DataPreviewResultOf1Ch1Segment.IndexOfMax
member.summary: Index of maximumvalue.

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.IniFileHandler
member.summary: Provides methods for reading and writing to an INI file.

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.IniFileHandler.MAX_SECTION_SIZE
member.summary: The maximum size of a section in an ini file.
member.remarks: This property defines the maximum size of the buffers used to retreive data from an ini file. This value is the maximum allowed by the win32 functions GetPrivateProfileSectionNames() or GetPrivateProfileString().

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.IniFileHandler.NativeMethods
member.summary: A static class that provides the win32 P/Invoke signatures used by this class.
member.remarks: Note: In each of the declarations below, we explicitly set CharSet to Auto. By default in C#, CharSet is set to Ansi, which reduces performance on windows 2000 and above due to needing to convert strings from Unicode (the native format for all .Net strings) to Ansi before marshalling. Using Auto lets the marshaller select the Unicode version of these functions when available.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.IniFileHandler.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The ini file to read and write from.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.IniFileHandler.Path
member.summary: Gets the full path of ini file this object instance is operating on.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.IniFileHandler.ReadKey(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of specified key in an ini file as a string.
member.param: The name of the section to read from.
The name of the key in section to read.
The default value to return if the key cannot be found.
member.returns: The value of the key, if found. Otherwise, returns
member.remarks: The retreived value must be less than 32KB in length.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.IniFileHandler.ReadKey(System.String,System.String,System.Int16)
member.summary: Gets the value of specified key in an ini file as a Int16 (short).
member.param: The name of the section to read from.
The name of the key in section to read.
The default value to return if the key cannot be found.
member.returns: The value of the key, if found. Otherwise, returns .

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.IniFileHandler.ReadKey(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the value of specified key in an ini file as a Int32.
member.param: The name of the section to read from.
The name of the key in section to read.
The default value to return if the key cannot be found.
member.returns: The value of the key, if found. Otherwise, returns

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.IniFileHandler.ReadKey(System.String,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Gets the value of specified key in an ini file as a double.
member.param: The name of the section to read from.
The name of the key in section to read.
The default value to return if the key cannot be found.
member.returns: The value of the key, if found. Otherwise, returns

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.IniFileHandler.GetSectionAsListOfPairs(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all of the values in a section as a list.
member.param: Name of the section to retrieve values from.
member.returns: A containing objects that describe this section. Use this verison if a section may contain multiple items with the same key value. If you know that a section cannot contain multiple values with the same key name or you don't care about the duplicates, use the more convenient function.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.IniFileHandler.GetSectionAsDictionary(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all of the values in a section as a dictionary.
member.param: Name of the section to retrieve values from.
member.returns: A containing the key/value pairs found in this section.
member.remarks: If a section contains more than one key with the same name, this function only returns the first instance. If you need to get all key/value pairs within a section even when keys have the same name, use .

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.IniFileHandler.GetKeyNames(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the names of all keys under a specific section in the ini file.
member.param: The name of the section to read key names from.
member.remarks: The total length of all key names in the section must be less than 32KB in length.

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.IniFileHandler.GetSectionNames
member.summary: Gets the names of all sections in the ini file.
member.remarks: The total length of all section names in the section must be less than 32KB in length.

member.summary: Converts the null seperated pointer to a string into a string array.
member.param: A pointer to string data.
Length of the data pointed to by .
member.returns: An array of strings; one for each null found in the array of characters pointed at by .

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.VectorFile._fileOpened
member.summary: Flag indicates whether file is opened.

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.VectorFile._fileHeaderSizeChangeable
member.summary: Indicates whether header size is changeable. In opening existing file use case, it is false. In creating new file use case, it is true until a "CommitDataInformation()" is called.

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.VectorFile._disableBuffering
member.summary: Whether the file will read/write without buffering. If true, KernelFileStream is used.

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.VectorFile._nativeFileInteropArray
member.summary: Internal byte[] for converting short[]/IntPtr data input/output for FileStream read/write. The Read()/Write() of C# FileStream class only accept byte[] data type, so we need to perform data type convert when reading/writing other data type (e.g. short[]/Intptr)

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.VectorFile._kernelFileInteropPtr
member.summary: Internal IntPtr for converting sbyte[]/short[] data input/output for KernelFileStream read/write. The Read()/Write() of KernelFileStream class only accept IntPtr data type, so we need to perform data type convert when reading/writing other data type (e.g. sbyte[]/short[]).

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JXI.FileIO.VectorFile.VectorFile._infoDictionary
member.summary: Dictionary contains all keys/values of Vector File header information.
